{"rule":"AFFORD_VBG","sentence":"^\\QLet \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q be segment \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q's “spacing” (most typically, the distance along the bus' path between the two stops) and \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q be segment \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q's “weight” (according to a chosen weighting scheme).\\E$"}
